results.question: Which hook is used to perform side effects in a React component?
What is the purpose of the useMemo hook?
results.correct_answer: To memoize expensive calculations and avoid re-computation
incorrect_answers: To fetch data from an API
To trigger side effects after render

results.question: Which of the following best describes Reactâ€™s Virtual DOM?
results.correct_answer: A lightweight copy of the actual DOM used for efficient UI updates
incorrect_answers: A direct reference to the browser DOM
A debugging tool for React developers

results.question: In React 18, what feature allows rendering parts of the UI without blocking the main thread?
What happens if you call setState() inside useEffect() without a dependency array?
results.correct_answer: It causes an infinite re-render loop

results.question: Which hook lets you access values across components without prop drilling?
What does React.StrictMode do?
results.correct_answer: Highlights potential problems in an application
